text: Rogue, a police crime drama television series, premiered on DirecTV's Audience network on April 3, 2013, and ended on May 24, 2017. The series stars Thandie Newton and was filmed in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2013)=== ===Season 2 (2014)=== ===Season 3 (2015–16)=== ===Season 4 (2017)=== == Home media == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Season ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Episodes ! scope="col" colspan="4" | DVD release dates |- ! scope="col" | Region 1 ! scope="col" | Region 2 ! scope="col" | Region 4 ! scope="col" | Discs |- |} == References == Rogue
